member.name: P:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarViewer.IsVisible
member.summary:
Whenever the health bar is showed or hidden.
Take into account that the script is still enabled and will update the health bar even if it's hidden.

member.name: P:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarViewer.IsEnabled
member.summary:
Whenever the health bar will be updated each frame or not.
Take into account that the script is still enabled but it won't be updated on each frame. Also, it's still visible.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarWorker.ManualUpdate(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary:
Modify the health bar values without producing any animation effects (sliding the bar or changing the numbers).
The health bar fill will be instantaneously set without producing animation. Health numbers will also change immediately.
Both damage bar and healing bar fill will be set to 0, halting any current animation on them.
Designed to initialize the health bar by first time.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarWorker.ManualUpdate(System.Single)
member.summary:
Modify the health bar values without producing any animation effects (sliding the bar or changing the numbers).
The health bar fill will be instantaneously set without producing animation. Health numbers will also change immediately.
Both damage bar and healing bar fill will be set to 0, halting any current animation on them.
Both current health and maximum health will be assigned by maxHealth.
Designed to initialize the health bar by first time. Thrown if is negative.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarWorker.UpdateValues(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary:
Modify the current health and maximum health.
This method will automatically calculate, show and animate the health bar, damage bar, healing bar and health number.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarWorker.FinishCurrentAnimation
member.summary: Finish instantaneously the animation of current health bar, damage bar, healing bar and health number.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarWorker.UpdateValues(System.Single)
member.summary:
Modify the current health.
This method will automatically calculate, show and animate the health bar, damage bar, healing bar and health number.

member.name: P:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarWorker.Health
member.summary: Modify current health and update animation if necessary.

member.name: P:Enderlook.Unity.Prefabs.HealthBarGUI.IHealthBarWorker.MaxHealth
